titleStmt.title: By the Protector. A proclamation of His Highness, prohibiting horse-races in England and Wales for eight moneths.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Lord Protector (1653-1658 : O. Cromwell)
Cromwell, Oliver, 1599-1658.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Henry Hills and John Field, Printers to His Highness,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Given at His Highness palace of Westminster the 8th day of April, in the year of our Lord, 1658.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
